Šokantno priznanje igralca: očetovim prijateljem je podajal džojnte
Vzgajal ga je natakar, njegovo življenje pa je bilo vse prej kot pravljično, v avtobiografiji razkriva Cameron Douglas, ki je bil nenehno navzkriž z zakonom.
04 Nov 2019, 14:46 by Tina Podobnik

guliver/cover imagesPriimek Douglas je Camerona navdajal z nasprotujočimi si čustvi. Zamislite si, kako je odraščati v senci hollywoodskih legend Kirka in Michaela Douglasa?! FOTO: GULIVER/GETTY IMAGES



Ječa zaradi zlorabe in posedovanja mamil ga je rešila.


Pripada najvišjim krogom hollywoodskega plemstva. Rodil se je namreč dvakratnemu oskarjevcu Michaelu Douglasu ter je vnuk ene največjih – še vedno živih – legend velikega platna Kirka Douglasa. A življenje Camerona Douglasa je bilo kljub izjemnemu pedigreju vse prej kot pravljica.Popolno je bilo morda le na papirju, ob pogledu na njegovo zavidanja vredno družinsko drevo, a v resničnosti je Cameron pogrešal toplino pravega družinskega življenja, hrepenel je po očetu, ki bi mu naklonil čas in pozornost, in želel si je biti samostojen, čeprav so nanj vsi gledali le kot na sina hollywoodskega težkokategornika. »Čudno je bilo gledati na lastnega očeta in dedka kot na velikana filmskega platna in gromozanskih reklamnih panojev. Počutil sem se skrajno majhnega in nepomembnega, nikoli nisem bil Cameron, temveč le sin nekoga. Le kako lahko namreč kdo tekmuje s Kirkom Douglasom? Kako naj kdo živi in je uspešen v senci Michaela Douglasa?« se v prihajajoči avtobiografiji sprašuje Cameron, v kateri je brez olepševanja razkril manj lepo plat tega, da pripadaš klanu Douglasovih.
Zapor je bil nov začetek


Očetov in dedkov obraz si je dal s črnilom vtisniti na trup. FOTO: instagraminstagram

Od polnoletnosti je bil tako rekoč nenehno navzkriž z zakonom. Njegova prva aretacija zaradi posedovanja kokaina sega namreč že v leto 1999, ko jih je dopolnil komaj 21, čeprav naj bi v resnici že veliko prej zavil na pot samouničenja. »Moj sin skoraj ni bil trezen, vsaj za daljše obdobje ne, od svojega 13. leta,« je pred časom priznal njegov slavni oče, ki naj bi tudi sinu brez dlake na jeziku dejal, da je verjetno le vprašanje časa, kdaj bo vzel prevelik odmerek droge, koga ubil oziroma bo kdo ubil njega. Zato je bilo oskarjevcu skoraj v olajšanje, ko je Camerona njegovo poigravanje s prepovedanim spravilo v kot in je zaradi preprodaje kokaina, heroina in metamfetamina leta 2009 pristal za zapahi. Prvotno za pet let, ker pa se niti v zaporu ni mogel odpovedati svoji nevarni razvadi, nato še za štiri.»Mislim, da je s tem dobil priložnost za novo življenje, nov začetek, česar se verjetno tudi sam zaveda,« je o sinovi devetletni zaporni kazni dejal Michael, ki ga je redno obiskoval v zaporu. Čeprav je, tako zdaj v knjigi razkriva Cameron, tudi sam verjetno precej dodal k temu, da je zašel na kriva pota.
Življenje v razvratu in preobilju
Ne le da je na očetovih divjih zabavah opazoval slavne obraze, kako se vdajajo omami, najsi alkoholni najsi prepovedani, oče je sinka tudi vpregel skoraj kot sla, ki je njegovim zvezdniškim prijateljem predajal zvitke marihuane. »Že kot mlad fante sem za očeta opravljal to in ono,« je zapisal o zabavah, na katerih so se trla imena, kot sta Jack Nicholson in Danny DeVito. »Tedaj še nisem vedel, za kaj gre, oče mi je le naročil, naj zvitek nesem temu in temu. Ko pa sem bil malce starejši, sem se plazil od hiše do hiše, plezal na balkone in videl precej več, kot bi smel – opazoval sem lepe odrasle, ki počno stvari, kakršne počno lepi odrasli, ki živijo v razvratu in preobilju.«
Obraza očeta Michaela in dedka Kirka si je dal Cameron vtetovirati.
Očetove zabave je opazoval iz kotov in senc ter čakal, da proti zori gostje popadajo po posteljah. Tedaj je prebrskal njihove torbe, iskal substance, ki so jim morda ostale, ter komaj čakal, da ga oče odpelje na zgodnji zajtrk. To je bil že skoraj njun obred, čeprav je Cameron pozneje spoznal, da ga ni navdahnila Michaelova želja po čim boljšem odnosu s sinom, temveč njegov želodec, ki je zaradi skrokanosti delal premete in je nujno potreboval krepko hrano. A to ni bil edini razlog za Cameronovo mnenje, da si Michael nikakor ne bi mogel prislužiti nagrade za najboljšega očeta leta.
Ločitev ga ni pretresla


Predlani je z malo Luo izzy začel spoznavati, kaj pomeni biti oče. FOTO: instagraminstagram

Kaj to, še v najdeseterico se ne bi prebil! Ko ga je namreč preblisnilo, da bi Cameron verjetno potreboval stalno prisotnost moškega, očetovskega lika v svojem življenju, se igralec ni odločil te vloge prevzeti sam, temveč je vanjo raje vpregel neznanca. »Tale je videti precej sposoben. Lahko bi bil gospodinjec,« je v hotelski restavraciji med družinskim kosilom s sinom in ženo Diandro pokazal na natakarja, za katerega se je izkazalo, da prihaja iz Salvadorja. Že kmalu je zaživel v njihovi hiši ter skrbel za Camerona od jutra do večera. No, vsaj dokler ga zaradi pitja niso odpustili, kar je – tako Cameron – takrat 10-letnemu fantiču zlomilo srce.Kot oče ni blestel, niti kot mož se Michael ni najbolje izkazal, saj ga je pretiran libido spravil v velikanske težave z Diandro, Cameronovo mamo. »Ozdravi se zasvojenosti z mamili, alkoholom in seksom ali pa te zapustim,« mu je, ko ga je v postelji zasačila z drugo, postavila ultimat. A čeprav se je zvezdnik tedaj skesano odpravil na rehabilitacijsko kliniko, ga terapija ni ozdravila nezvestobe. Še naprej je skakal v tuje postelje, vse do leta 1995, ko je njegove zunajzakonske dejavnosti v objektiv ujel zasebni detektiv, ki je Douglasu sledil po Diandrinih navodilih. »Žalostno je, če pomislim nazaj, a ko so mi starši tedaj povedali, da se ločujejo, me to ni pretreslo. Prej sem to sprejel kot nekaj dobrodošlega in si oddahnil.« A če je mislil, da bo kot otrok ločenih staršev več časa prebil z očetom, ali vsaj več kakovostnega, se je motil. Še vedno je živel in odraščal v očetovi senci ter vse globlje tonil v svet droge.
Oče se je le spremenil


Zamislite si, kako je odraščati v senci hollywoodskih legend Kirka in Michaela Douglasa?! FOTO: GULIVER/GETTY IMAGESguliver/cover images

Vse je za nekaj dobro. Očitno tudi zapor. Ne le da mu je skoraj desetletje za zapahi verjetno rešilo življenje, v samoti zaporniške celice je Cameron začel razreševati tudi svoje mladostne travme, povezane z očetom. »Nikoli se nisem znal soočiti z nasprotujočimi si čustvi, ki sem jih gojil do svojega imena. Po eni strani me je priimek Douglas navdajal s ponosom, po drugi pa me je razžiralo, da me opredeljuje in definira, saj je zaslepil ljudi, da so videli le to, in ne mene kot osebo.« To je premagal na precej svojstven način. Obraza očeta in dedka si je dal vtetovirati!»Z očetom nikoli nisva postala prijatelja, kot to na neki točki uspe mnogim, a sva naposled na poti k temu. Počasi gradiva odnos, ki sem si ga vselej želel imeti z njim,« še piše Cameron, pri čemer levji delež zaslug pripisuje Catherine Zeta-Jones, ki je Michaela skoraj silila, da »se začne do mene vesti bolj kot oče in mi izkazovati starševsko ljubezen«. Slednjo Cameron zdaj dobro pozna tudi sam, saj se mu je predlani iz ljubezni z Viviane Thibes rodila hčerka Lua Izzy.
5 let zapora si je prislužil zaradi preprodaje drog, nato pa še dodatne štiri.

The dungeon for the abuse and possession of drugs saved him.


It belongs to the highest circles of the Hollywood nobility. Born twice to Oscar-winner Michael Douglas, he is the grandson of one of the biggest - still alive - legends of Kirk Douglas' big screen. But Cameron Douglas's life, despite his extreme pedigree, was anything but a fairy tale. It might have been perfect on paper, looking at his enviable family tree, but in reality Cameron missed the warmth of a true family life, longing for a father who would favor him time and attention, and he wanted to be on his own, even though everyone only viewed him as the son of a Hollywood heavyweight. “It was strange to look at my own father and grandfather as the giant of film screen and bulky billboards. I felt extremely small and insignificant, I was never Cameron, but only the son of someone. How can anyone compete with Kirk Douglas? How can anyone live and be successful in the shadow of Michael Douglas? ”Cameron wonders in an upcoming autobiography, revealing, without embellishment, the less beautiful side of being a member of the Douglas clan.
The prison was a fresh start


He inked his father and grandfather's face on his torso. PHOTO: instagraminstagram

From the age of adulthood, he was virtually at odds with the law. His first arrest for cocaine possession dates back to 1999, when he was only 21, though in fact he was about to embark on a course of self-destruction. "My son has hardly been sober, at least not for a long time, since he was 13," admitted his famous father, who also said to his son, without a hair on his tongue, that it was probably only a matter of time before he would pick up drug overdose, who will kill or will kill him. Therefore, it was almost a relief for the Oscars when Cameron was banned from angling and for the 2009 cocaine, heroin and methamphetamine dealership was locked. Originally for five years, because even in prison he couldn't give up his dangerous feud, and then for four more. "I think that this gave him an opportunity for a new life, a new beginning, which he is probably aware of as well," nine years in prison, said Michael, who regularly visited him in prison. Although, as Cameron now reveals in the book, he himself probably added a great deal to the fact that he went the wrong way.
A life of debauchery and copiousness
Not only did he watch his father's wild parties at celebrities cheering on stuns, even though alcohol is forbidden, he also harnessed his son almost like a slay, handing over marijuana rolls to his celebrity friends. "As a young boy, I used to do this and that for my dad," he wrote of parties that boasted names like Jack Nicholson and Danny DeVito. “At that time I didn't know what it was about, my father just told me to bring this roll to this and that. However, when I was a little older, I crawled from house to house, climbed balconies and saw much more than I should have - I watched beautiful adults doing things like nice adults living in debauchery and abundance. "
Father Michael and Grandfather Kirk had Cameron tattooed.
He watched his father's party from corners and shadows, waiting for the dawn to fall on the beds. At that time, he was browsing through their bags, looking for substances they might have left, and could hardly wait for his father to take him to an early breakfast. It was almost a ritual of theirs, though Cameron later realized that he was not inspired by Michael's desire to have the best possible relationship with his son, but rather by his stomach, which, due to its modesty, was making a fortune and was in dire need of hearty food. But that was not the only reason for Cameron's opinion that Michael could not in any way earn the Best Father of the Year award.
The separation did not shake him


Predanni began to understand what it meant to be a father with little Luo izzy. PHOTO: instagraminstagram

What the hell, I wouldn't even break into my thirties! Namely, when it dawned on him that Cameron would probably need the constant presence of a male, fatherly character in his life, the actor did not decide to take on this role himself, but rather harbored a stranger into it. “He looks pretty capable here. He could be a housewife, ”he pointed to a waiter at a hotel restaurant during a family lunch with his son and wife, Diandro, who appeared to be from El Salvador. He soon came to their house and took care of Cameron from morning till evening. Well, at least until he was fired for drinking, which - so Cameron - broke the heart of a 10-year-old boy at the time. As a father, he didn't shine as well as her husband, Michael did his best, as exaggerated libido got him into huge problems with Diandra. Cameron's mom. "Get rid of drug addiction, alcohol and sex, or leave you," she placed him with an ultimatum when she found him in bed with another. But even though the superstar went to a rehab clinic at the time, therapy did not cure him of infidelity. He continued to leap to foreign beds until 1995, when his extramarital affairs were captured by a private detective who followed Douglas, following Diandra's instructions. "It's sad to think back, but when my parents told me at the time that they were divorcing, it didn't shake me. Earlier, I accepted this as something welcome and took a breather. ”But if he thought that as a child of divorced parents he would spend more time with his father, or at least more quality, he was wrong. He still lived and grew up in his father's shadow, sinking deeper into the drug world.
Dad just changed


Just imagine growing up in the shadow of Hollywood legends Kirk and Michael Douglas ?! PHOTO: GULIVER / GETTY IMAGESguliver / cover images

It's all for the good. Apparently jail too. Not only did he probably have a life in prison for nearly a decade, but in the solitary confinement of the prison cell, Cameron also began to resolve his adolescent trauma linked to his father. “I have never known how to deal with the conflicting emotions that I have cultivated to my name. On the one hand, the Douglas family name made me proud, and on the other, it angered me to define and define me, because it blinded people to seeing only that and not me as a person. ”He overcame this in a rather peculiar way. You and your grandfather had a tattoo! ”We never became friends with our father, as at some point he succeeds in many, but eventually we are on our way to that. We are slowly building the relationship I always wanted to have with him, ”writes Cameron, with the lion's share of credit to Catherine Zeta-Jones, who almost forced Michael to“ start behaving more like a father to me and show me parental love. " Cameron is now well aware of the latter, since his daughter Lua Izzy was born out of love with Viviane Thibes.
He earned 5 years in prison for drug trafficking, and then another four.
